General.Name: Yieh United Steel
General.Description: Yieh United Steel Corp. produces and sells stainless steel products in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers stainless steel billets, hot rolled black coils and plates, coils and sheets, cold rolled coils and sheets, and slabs for home and office uses, and industrial and transport applications, as well as for architecture, building, and construction applications. It also provides carbon steel products, including carbon steel slabs, billets, blacks, and plates for industrial applications. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
